text: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۢا

translation.en.sahih: He admits whom He wills into His mercy; but the wrongdoers - He has prepared for them a painful punishment.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan memasukkan siapa yang dikehendaki-Nya ke dalam rahmat-Nya (surga). Dan bagi orang-orang zalim disediakan-Nya azab yang pedih.
